SELECT grp_cd AS grp_cd , grp_cd AS parent_grp_cd , cd AS cd , cd_nm AS grp_nm , cd_nm AS cd_nm , sort_no , use_yn FROM tb_cd_mst WHERE del_yn = 'N' AND sort_no = 0
AND use_yn = #{searchUseYn}
AND (grp_cd LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR cd_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY grp_cd ASC

SELECT grp_cd , cd , cd_nm , sort_no , adinfo_01 , adinfo_02 , adinfo_03 , adinfo_04 , adinfo_05 , use_yn FROM tb_cd_mst WHERE del_yn = 'N' AND grp_cd = #{parent_grp_cd} AND sort_no > 0 ORDER BY sort_no ASC, cd ASC
SELECT LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(cd AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 2, '0') FROM tb_cd_mst WHERE del_yn = 'N' AND grp_cd = #{parent_grp_cd} AND cd REGEXP '^[0-9]+$' AND sort_no > 0
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(sort_no), 0) + 1 FROM tb_cd_mst WHERE del_yn = 'N' AND grp_cd = #{parent_grp_cd} AND sort_no > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cd_mst ( grp_cd, cd, cd_nm, sort_no, use_yn, del_yn, crt_ts, crt_by, upd_ts, upd_by ) VALUES ( #{grp_cd}, #{cd}, #{cd_nm}, 0, #{use_yn}, 'N', NOW(), #{userId}, NOW(), #{userId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cd_nm = #{cd_nm}, use_yn = #{use_yn}, del_yn = 'N', upd_ts = NOW(), upd_by = #{userId}
